name: Experiment 626
description:
## Plot

You awake in a strange place, it's dark and cold, and there are no light sources, but it's not dark. There are remains of really strange experiments all around. You must find your way out of this place.

## How to play

- Move with Arrow Keys or WASD.
- Pick up all the notes, and figure out the story behind them.
- There are clues about the exit in the notes.
- All notes you pick will be on your side.

Game made for Ludum Dare 48 with love by:
@morcado
@TurtleFlyte
@CocoMendes
@alirioAngel
